Actions.Name: Delete row
Actions.Description: This operation deletes a row from a table.

Actions.Name: Get row
Actions.Description: This operation gets a row from a table.

Actions.Name: Get rows
Actions.Description: This operation gets rows from a table.

Actions.Name: Get tables
Actions.Description: This operation gets tables from a database.

Actions.Name: Update row
Actions.Description: This operation updates an existing row in a table.

Actions.Name: Insert row
Actions.Description: This operation inserts a new row into a table.
